text: Anabi won tun so fun won pe: "Dajudaju ami ijoba re ni pe, apoti yoo wa ba yin. Nnkan ifayabale lati odo Oluwa yin ati ohun tâ€™o seku ninu ohun ti awon eniyan (Anabi) Musa ati eniyan (Anabi) Harun fi sile n be ninu apoti naa. Awon molaika maa ru u wa (ba yin). Dajudaju ami wa ninu iyen fun yin, ti e ba je onigbagbo ododo
